column5: went up to upper buchorn lake for 2 days at a friends cottage to do some muskie and bass fishing and we had a greatt time. in the total of the 2 days we only managed about a tatal of 8 hours of fishing due to all of the wind, rain and lighting. we went out saturday night and withing 20 minutes(not joking) we boated 3 muskie and one of them was caugh on my dads bass rod. i think we found the honey hole  i was the only 1 out of 3 of us that was actually targeting muskie. the others were fishing bass. we caught several bass as well. the first muskie was caught by me on a white joe bucher shallow raider and the next one was caught 5 minutes after on an all white husky jerk (caught by my dad)it was the same size as the first musky shown, not even 10 muntes later i caught my pb musky on a black and orange dbl cowgirl. overall i say oit was a good weekend  here are some pictures, and we didnt get a measurement on the big guy we wanted to get a picture and put him in the water asap.
Nothin like some messy weather to stir up them Muskies!
nice looking fish! Not bad for 20 minutes
Wow!  Sweet fish!  Three in 20 minutes is crazy...congrats...great looking muskies!
